CustomField.description: Enables the slack message sent to the Requester when the CRP team takes ownership of their Request and it is switched from P2P to Managed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enables the slaack message sent to the Requester when the CRP team takes ownership of their Request and it is switched from P2P to Managed.
CustomField.label: P2P2Managed Change-Requester Slack
